mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspAbTestRev Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AB_TEST_SN , SET_TURN , REV_SN , REV_CPST_TURN , DVC_SECT_CD , AB_TEST_GRP_CD , AB_TEST_REV_DSCR , MOD_TURN , EXPSR_RT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_AB_TEST_REV WHERE 1 = 1 AND AB_TEST_SN = #{abTestSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND SET_TURN = #{setTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REV_SN = #{revSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REV_CPST_TURN = #{revCpstTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DVC_SECT_CD = #{dvcSectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
